post:
Since 2012, GoldenBeaverHosting.com is a web host and VPS provider. Dedicated to price-quality ratio, we provide quality services for those on a low budget. We believe that the web should remain cheap, reliable and accessible to everyones.

4 locations in USA:

Los Angeles – Telx – 600 W 7th St, Los Angeles, CA 90017
Dallas – Zayo – 8600 Harry Hines Blvd, Dallas, TX, 75235
Chicago – Equinix – 350 E Cermak Rd, Chicago, IL 60616
Miami – Equinix – 36 NE 2nd St, Miami, FL 33132

Each Linux Virtual Private Server is powered by Intel Xeon processors with a minimum of 24 CPU cores per system. SSD Cache based RAID-10 arrays provide maximum I/O for your server ensuring a fast and responsive VPS.
